    • getInvoiceList

      public ArrayList<Invoice> getInvoiceList()

      invoice list of invoices.

    • addInvoiceToList

      public void addInvoiceToList​(Invoice i)
      Add invoice to invoice list given index relative to its invoice list.
      Parameters:
      i - Index of invoice list.

    • createInvoice

      public void createInvoice​(String invoiceID, String orderID, String staffID, String date, String time, double gstRate, double gstPrice, double membershipRate, double membershipDiscountPrice, double serviceRate, double servicePrice, double totalPrice, double netTotal, boolean isMember)
      Creates a Invoice object given the parameters.
      Parameters:
      invoiceID - Unique randomly generated invoice id.
      orderID - Unique randomly generated order id.
      staffID - Unique randomly generated staff id.
      date - Date of invoice creation.
      time - Time of invoice creation.
      gstRate - GstRate of totalPrice.
      gstPrice - GstPrice is the calculated value.
      membershipRate - MembershipRate discount of totalPrice.
      membershipDiscountPrice - membershipDiscountPrice is the calculated value.
      serviceRate - ServiceRate of totalPrice
      servicePrice - ServicePrice is the calculated value.
      totalPrice - TotalPrice is the subtotal amount of the orders.
      netTotal - NetTotal is the total price inclusive of discounts and additional charges.
      isMember - isMember is the status of Customer.

    • getInvoiceListByMonth

      public ArrayList<Invoice> getInvoiceListByMonth​(int month)
      Parameters:
      month -
      Returns:
      ArrayList of invoices given a month.

    • getInvoiceListForCurrentDay

      public ArrayList<Invoice> getInvoiceListForCurrentDay()
      Returns:
      ArrayList of invoices for the day.

    • save

      public void save()
      Updates and saves the invoice list.
